page.title: 07UNIFORMED ORGANISATIONS
page.content: A further aspect of the survey was whether the children belonged to a "Uniformed Organisation." 88 did not belong to any group 46.3% 43 belong to Brownies 22.6% 29 belong to Cubs 15.3% 11 belong to Guides 5.8% 8 belong to Church Lads Brigade 4.2% 4 belong to Scouts 2.1% 3 belong to The Red Cross 1.5% 2 belong to Beavers 1.1% 2 belong to Boys brigade 1.1% When asked if they liked their activity very much, moderatly or not very much, 82% of Cubs said they liked it very much and 65% gave it full marks. 69% of Brownies liked it very much and 53% gave it full marks. Over half of the organisations based in Pensby meet in a church hall, and are named after Barnston (the parish). Others are called Heswall.
